description: The Times is discontinuing the Prescriptions blog.
title: A Note to Readers of This Blog
title_page: A Note to Readers of This Blog - The New York Times
text: The Times is discontinuing the Prescriptions blog, which was created to track the debate and aftermath of the 2009 health care law. This change will allow us to direct limited production resources to other online projects. But we will continue our vigorous reporting on the health care industry, including coverage of patients, insurers, medical professionals and drug-makers, within the Business and Health sections and on the Well blog. Thanks to all of our readers.
